overview: 1 year after the events of the first Dinosaur Story, Noahsaurus encounters a mysterious Triceratops who secretly is forming an unknown plot. Before long, Noahsaurus starts to become suspicious. He also learns that his plan has something to do with the end of the world. Now, Noahsaurus reunites with his friends, and they go on a mission to prevent the extinction of the dinosaurs.
title: Another Dinosaur Story
